CLEANING & REPAIR

We pride ourselves on carrying some of the finest quality rugs on the market. Most of them will last generations when cared for properly. Here are some basic guidelines and advice to protect and care for you heirloom quality investment. Our rug cleaners deal exclusively with oriental rugs and have for generations.
